sources.title: My friend Joe (Awarded FAMILY FILM CLASSICS whole film German, family films 2023 new)

metadata.Plot: During the course of one summer, a young Irish lad named Chris befriends an American boy named Joe. The two couldn't be more different, yet they become inseparable. Things turn horribly wrong however, when Chris discovers his new best friend isn't a he, but a she. The sadness only begins as Chris learns why Joe's gender must be kept a secret.
metadata.Writer: David Howard, Declan Hughes, Peter Pohl
metadata.Actors: Schuyler Fisk, John Cleere, Stephen McHattie
